all you have to do is change these

			healing[1] = 40;
			healing[2] = 40;

to one of these depending on what you hp is set on your server

newHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
currentHealth = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);

item.source: When weapon hold your getting healed

item.title: When weapon hold your getting healed
item.dc:creator: @kiaz kiaz
item.description:
@kiaz wrote:

that is the heal methhod if you look down at healing() { you will see that peace of code

lets say you hp is 1 out of 99

playerLevel[3] = 1 or your source may call your hp “newHP” or “currentHealth” so it will be “1” coz u have 1 hp left

getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); this is getting your hp exp and changing it to how igh ur level is for that exp in this case “99”

so once it has that value of 99

saying this
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
means
playerlevel = 99

or if ya hp isnt playerLevel[3]

it will be one of these
newHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
currentHealth = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);

i hope this hellped

Read full topic
item.source: When weapon hold your getting healed

item.title: When weapon hold your getting healed
item.dc:creator: @BlackBeast666 BlackBeast666
item.description:
@BlackBeast666 wrote:

I’m using it in this contens:

[code]
public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {
int targetSlot = 0;
if(slot == playerWeapon && duelRule[4]) {
sendMessage(“Weapons are disabled in this duel!”);
}
if((slot == playerHat || slot == playerCape || slot == playerChest || slot == playerLegs || slot == playerShield || slot == playerFeet) && duelRule[5]) {
sendMessage(“Armour is disabled in this duel!”);
}

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11190 == true) {//by Blckbeast
if(playerLevel[3] <= 149) {
healing[1] = 40;
healing[2] = 40;
}
}

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == true){ //Ring of Stone
npcId = 2626;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == false){
isNpc = false;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2007, 04:32:14 AM[/size][hr][quote=“kiaz, post:3, topic:160548”]id do this in wear()

if(wearID == WeaponID){
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
}

but i think you may use currentHealth or the other one depending on what ya hp is so u mite have to use
currentHealth = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);[/quote]

I don’t get how this heals your hp?

Read full topic

item.title: When weapon hold your getting healed
item.dc:creator: @BlackBeast666 BlackBeast666
item.description:
@BlackBeast666 wrote:

I want that when you hold a weapon your hp is healed instandly

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11190 == true) {//by Blckbeast if(playerLevel[3] <= 99) { healing[1] = 40; healing[2] = 40; } }

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11190 == true) {//by Blckbeast if(playerLevel[0] <= 99) { healing[1] = 40; healing[2] = 40; } }

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11190 == true) {//by Blckbeast if(playerLevel[3] <= 99) { healing[0] = 40; } }

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11190 == true) {//by Blckbeast if(playerLevel[0] <= 99) { healing[0] = 40; } }

but all don’t work
What should it be?
